Package com.teamten.render

Interface Summary
Light Represents a light source and the algorithm to light a point.
Material Can shade a material given a list of lights and an intersection point.
RayTracer Interface for tracing rays and shading points.
 

Class Summary
AmbientOcclusionMaterial Implements the ambient occlusion material.
BoundingBox Represents an axis-aligned box that bounds some geometry, including a list of that geometry and possible nested bounding boxes.
Color Represents an immutable ARGB color.
DirectionalLight Represents an infinitely far away directional light.
Intersection Records the results of an intersection hit.
PhongMaterial Implementation of the Phong shading model.
Renderer A renderer from geometry to image files.
Triangle Represents an immutable triangle in 3D.
TriangleComparator Compares triangles for sorting.
